text:
The development of the first EU-approved #vaccine for #COVID19 built on important insights from #NeutronScattering experiments undertaken with JCNS @mlz_garching 👇

Find out about the applications of #NeutronScience in the fight against viral diseases at https://t.co/IK6QU5yZJl https://t.co/HGrIeHjn7n
